body: Thanks for the advice! Normandy is already doing [some processing of XPI files](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/master/recipe-server/normandy/studies/api/v2/fields.py), treating them like regular zip files and reading individual files out. Hopefully we aren't doing anything goofy there. We don't check for hybrid extensions though, which is a good thing we should be watching out for.
